ResearchProjectDef.label: salt mixing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of specific types of salt, by mixing together other salts at the Telvanni forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: salt purifying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows purifying salts using aetherial salts, removing imperfections and increasing their potency, at the Telvanni forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic transmutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows using salts to transmute steel, silver and gold, at the Telvanni forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heart stone studies Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows reigniting depleted heart stones at the Telvanni forge.\n\nAdditionally, the chances of obtaining a depleted heart stone after activating a pulser, or completing unfinished roots, is increased by 5%.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heart stone studies Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows crafting the heart stone implant at the Telvanni forge.\n\nAdditionally, the chances of obtaining a depleted heart stone after activating a pulser, or completing unfinished roots, is increased by 5%.

ResearchProjectDef.label: elixir duplication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows duplicating elixirs using dopller spores at the elixir table.\n\nElixirs must be of the same type, but can be of different quality levels. The quality level of the duplicate elixir will match that of the parent.
